software.description:
MultiTracer version 2 is a compiled Java 1.6 application. It supports NIfTI-1.1 format float, double and signed and unsigned byte, short, and integer formats and provides legacy support for Analyze 7.5 8 and 16 bit images. It provides image display, editing, delineation of structure boundaries, export of traced contours and generation of masked volumes. Images are displayed in 3 orthogonal views. Time series can be displayed as averaged or contrast images and time courses can be visualized graphically. Version 2 provides enhancements to the original MultiTracer feature set described in Woods RP. Multitracer: a Java-based tool for anatomic delineation of grayscale volumetric images. Neuroimage 2003 Aug;19(4):1829-34.

Documentation: http://air.bmap.ucla.edu/MultiTracer2/Mu...
Download: http://www.bmap.ucla.edu/portfolio/softw...
